channel.title: The Secret Wood Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: S.G. Overton reads from The Secret Wood. You can read along!
channel.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
channel.description: S.G. Overton reads chapters from his children's book The Secret Wood. This podcast includes both text and audio files, so you can read along as you listen.
channel.itunes:summary: S.G. Overton reads chapters from his children's book The Secret Wood. This podcast includes both text and audio files, so you can read along as you listen.

item.title: The Secret Wood - Listen to Chapter Ten
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Ten "There Comes a Time of Sadness"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: S.G. Overton reads the tenth and final chapter of The Secret Wood. Peter feels the need to visit each of his friends and his favourite places in the Wood, as if something sad is about to happen.

item.title: The Secret Wood - Read Chapter Ten
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Ten "There Comes a Time of Sadness"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: Peter feels the need to visit each of his friends and his favourite places in the Wood, as if something sad is about to happen.

item.title: The Secret Wood - Listen to Chapter Nine
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Nine "To Touch the Sky"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: S.G. Overton reads the ninth chapter of The Secret Wood. When a giant mountain springs up in the Wood, the friends can’t resist climbing it, especially since it just might reach to the Moon!

item.title: The Secret Wood - Read Chapter Nine
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Nine "To Touch the Sky"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: When a giant mountain springs up in the Wood, the friends can’t resist climbing it, especially since it just might reach to the Moon!

item.title: The Secret Wood - Listen to Chapter Eight
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Eight "Treasure Hunt"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: S.G. Overton reads the eighth chapter of The Secret Wood. Peter stumbles onto a trail of clues leading to pirate treasure!

item.title: The Secret Wood - Read Chapter Eight
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Eight "Treasure Hunt"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: Peter stumbles onto a trail of clues leading to pirate treasure!

item.title: The Secret Wood - Listen to Chapter Seven
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Seven "A Little Bit Of Rain"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: S.G. Overton reads the seventh chapter of The Secret Wood. Peter and his friends need all of their courage and cleverness when a gigantic flood covers the entire Wood.

item.title: The Secret Wood - Read Chapter Seven
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Seven "A Little Bit Of Rain"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: Peter and his friends need all of their courage and cleverness when a gigantic flood covers the entire Wood.

item.title: The Secret Wood - Listen to Chapter Six
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Six "The Ceiling Over The World"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: S.G. Overton reads the sixth chapter of The Secret Wood. A cloud so thick they can walk on it, traps the friends high in the sky, with no way to get back down.

item.title: The Secret Wood - Read Chapter Six
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Six "The Ceiling Over The World"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: A cloud so thick they can walk on it, traps the friends high in the sky, with no way to get back down.

item.title: The Secret Wood - Listen to Chapter Five
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Five "Hide and Seek"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: S.G. Overton reads the fifth chapter of The Secret Wood. A game of Hide and Seek turns serious when Léolin finds herself in terrible danger.

item.title: The Secret Wood - Read Chapter Five
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Five "Hide and Seek"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: A game of Hide and Seek turns serious when Léolin finds herself in terrible danger.

item.title: The Secret Wood - Listen to Chapter Four
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Four "The Wood has a Visitor"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: S.G. Overton reads the fourth chapter of The Secret Wood. Peter awakens from a dream about his uncle’s puppy only to learn that a frightening creature has suddenly appeared through the ‘doorway’ from the other worlds, and is scaring the helpless animals.

item.title: The Secret Wood - Read Chapter Four
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Four "The Wood has a Visitor"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: Peter awakens from a dream about his uncle’s puppy only to learn that a frightening creature has suddenly appeared through the ‘doorway’ from the other worlds, and is scaring the helpless animals.

item.title: The Secret Wood - Listen to Chapter Three
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Three "To Find Another World"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: S.G. Overton reads the second chapter of The Secret Wood. Peter and his friends search for the way back to Peter's home, but The Wood seems to be playing tricks on them.

item.title: The Secret Wood - Read Chapter Three
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Three "To Find Another World"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: Peter and his friends search for the way back to Peter's home, but The Wood seems to be playing tricks on them.

item.title: The Secret Wood - Listen to Chapter Two
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Two "The Search For A Home"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: S.G. Overton reads the second chapter of The Secret Wood. Peter's new friends try to find a suitable place for him to live, and he discovers that The Wood has a strange magic: it is never the same two days in a row!

item.title: The Secret Wood - Read Chapter Two
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter Two "The Search For A Home"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: Peter's new friends try to find a suitable place for him to live, and he discovers that The Wood has a strange magic: it is never the same two days in a row!

item.title: The Secret Wood - Listen to Chapter One
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter One "The World Inside The Picture Book"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: S.G. Overton reads the first chapter of The Secret Wood. 8-year-old Peter hopes to escape from a rainy summer day by looking through an old picture book. Instead he is drawn into a magical wood bursting with exciting adventures.

item.title: The Secret Wood - Read Chapter One
item.itunes:subtitle: Chapter One "The World Inside The Picture Book"
item.itunes:author: S.G. Overton
item.description: 8-year-old Peter hopes to escape from a rainy summer day by looking through an old picture book. Instead he is drawn into a magical wood bursting with exciting adventures.
